properties.Remarks: Tuen Mun Woman Health Centre (WHC) will undergo renovation and close temporarily starting from 1 April 2019. The Woman Health Service of Tuen Mun WHC will be transferred to Tuen Mun Wu Hong Maternal and Child Health Centre (MCHC) on the same day until further notice.
properties.備註: 由二零一九年四月一日起，屯門婦女健康中心將會暫時關閉及停止服務，以進行內部工程。而屯門婦女健康中心的婦女健康服務會於同日起在屯門湖康母嬰健康院繼續提供，直至另行通知。
